SA10n1054:6: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā - bālo bhikṣave aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate |
SA10n1054:8: raktaḥ san rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manaseti vistaraḥ |
SA10n1054:10: syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavo yadi rāgādaya eva kleśāḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1054:11: ihāyaṃ rāgaḥ parikalpyamāno bālapṛthagjanaiḥ sati rakte nare parikalpyeta asati vā?
SA10n1054:14: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati ||1 ||
SA10n1054:15: tatra rāgaḥ saktiradhyavasānaṃ saṅgo'bhiniveśa iti paryāyāḥ |
SA10n1054:17: sa yadi rakto rāgātpūrvaṃ rāgatiraskṛto rāgarahito bhavet,
SA10n1054:18: tadā taṃ rāgatiraskṛtaṃ raktaṃ pratītya rāgo bhavet |
SA10n1054:19: evaṃ sakti rakte rāgo bhavediti yuktam |
SA10n1054:26: rakte'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1054:28: tadā kathamasati rakte nirāśrayo rāgaḥ setsyati?
SA10n1054:29: na hi asati phale tatpakkatā saṃbhavatīti ||
SA10n1054:37: yasmādayaṃ rakta iṣyamāṇaḥ sati vā rāge parikalpyeta, asati vā?
SA10n1054:39: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ ||2 ||
SA10n1054:40: tatra yadi sati rāge raktaḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10n1054:41: tatrāpi eṣa eva rāgānupapattikramo'nantarokto rakte'pi tulyaḥ |
SA10n1054:45: rāge'sati punā raktaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1054:48: atrāha - naiva hi rāgaraktayoḥ paurvāparyeṇa saṃbhavo yata idaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāt,
SA10n1054:58: api ca | anayo rāgaraktayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ ekatve parikalpyeta pṛthaktve vā?
SA10n1054:63: na hi rāgasvātmā rāgādavyatirikto rāgeṇa saheti vyapadiśyate ||
SA10n1054:66: na hi pṛthagbhūtayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇayorvā sahabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti ||4 ||
SA10n1054:71: tadā yatra yatraikatvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva ityekasyāpi sahabhāvaḥ syāt |
SA10n1054:72: pṛthaktve'pi sahabhāve iṣyamāṇe yatra yatra pṛthaktvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva iti aśvādivyatiriktasya pṛthagavasthitasya goḥ asahāyasya sahabhāvaḥ syāt ||5 ||
SA10n1054:78: kiṃ rāganirapekṣo raktaḥ siddho yatastayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ syāt?
SA10n1054:80: na tvevaṃ rāgaraktau pṛthakpṛthaksiddhāviti nāstyanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ ||6 ||
SA10n1054:91: pṛthakpṛthag rāgaraktayoḥ siddhirnāstīti kṛtvā yadyanayoḥ sahabhāvamicchasi,
SA10n1054:94: nanvevaṃ sati itaretarāśrayāyāṃ siddhau sthitāyāṃ kasyedānīṃ siddhau satyāṃ kasya siddhirastu ? ||8 ||
SA10n1054:98: nāstyeva sa pṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvānapekṣo yasmin pṛthagbhāve sati sahabhāvasiddhiḥ syādityasaṃbhāvayannāha -
SA10n1054:101: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha |
SA10n1054:102: iti | yathā ca rāgaraktayorna paurvāparyeṇa siddhiḥ nāpi sahabhāvena,
SA10n1054:107: yo rajyeta yatra vā rajyeta yena vā rajyeta,
SA10n1054:108: yo duṣyeta yatra vā duṣyeta yena vā duṣyeta,
SA10n1054:109: yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta yena vā muhyeta,
SA10n1054:110: sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati taṃ dharma nopalabhate |
SA10n1054:116: niḥkleśo vaśībhūtaḥ suvimuktacittaḥ suvimuktaprajña ājāneyo mahābhāgaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahatabhāro'nuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sarvacetovaśitāparamapāramiprāptaḥ śramaṇa ityucyate |
